product_name: Giro Factor ACC Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: Giro Factor ACC Bike Shoes optimize comfort and power transfer for maximum pedaling efficiency. Ramp up your ride with their superb fit, micro-adjustable buckles and light, stiff carbon outsoles. Evofiber(TM) lightweight, breathable microfiber upper molds to the shape of your foot. Low-profile, micro-adjustable MR-1 ratcheting buckle closure lets you make precise adjustments on the fly, and is replaceable. Offset strap D-ring is located at midfoot. Easton(R) EC90 ACC unidirectional carbon fiber outsoles are now lighter and stiffer than ever. Replaceable walking pads at the heel enhance durability. Giro Factor ACC Bike Shoes offer adjustable arch support with the SuperNatural Fit Kit; includes low, medium and high arch supports you can easily swap out on the footbed. X-Static(R) antimicrobial footbed topsheet manages odor.
short_description: Giro Factor ACC Bike Shoes optimize comfort and power transfer for maximum pedaling efficiency. Ramp up your ride with their superb fit, micro-adjustable buckles and light, stiff carbon outsoles.
